name: Zetian

skills.name: Celestial Armament
skills.description_text:
Phoenix Crown: When Zetian hits enemy heroes with Phoenix Strike or Phoenix Descent, she gains 1% Spell Vamp for 5s, stacking up to 10 times.
Celestial Robe: The power of the Phoenix periodically protects Zetian, knocking back and stunning any enemy hero who dares approach her while dealing 90(+10*Hero Level) (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to them. She also gains a 300(+20*Hero Level) (+50% Total Magic Power) Shield that lasts 3s. This effect has a 120s cooldown.
skills.description_html:
Phoenix Crown: When Zetian hits enemy heroes with Phoenix Strike or Phoenix Descent, she gains 1% Spell Vamp for 5s, stacking up to 10 times.
Celestial Robe: The power of the Phoenix periodically protects Zetian, knocking back and stunning any enemy hero who dares approach her while dealing 90(+10*Hero Level) (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to them. She also gains a 300(+20*Hero Level) (+50% Total Magic Power) Shield that lasts 3s. This effect has a 120s cooldown.

skills.name: Phoenix Strike
skills.description_text:
Zetian unleashes a Phoenix Wave in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, she automatically casts another wave, up to 3 times. While casting, Zetian can use other skills.
The three Phoenix Waves deal 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage/200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage/385 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, respectively. The third wave hits a larger area and pulls enemies toward the skill direction (not considered a control effect).
This skill only has 65% Spell Vamp efficiency against Minions.
skills.description_html:
Zetian unleashes a Phoenix Wave in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, she automatically casts another wave, up to 3 times. While casting, Zetian can use other skills.
The three Phoenix Waves deal 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage/200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage/385 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage, respectively. The third wave hits a larger area and pulls enemies toward the skill direction (not considered a control effect).
This skill only has 65% Spell Vamp efficiency against Minions.

skills.name: Phoenix Descent
skills.description_text:
Zetian summons a Phoenix Spirit at the target location, dealing 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applying a brief 50% slow effect to enemies in the area. The Phoenix Spirit hovers at the location for 3s, dealing 20 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.5s and reducing enemies' Magic Defense by 10% while revealing their surrounding area.
While the Phoenix Spirit is active, Zetian can use this skill again to command it to charge toward a designated location, dealing 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applying a brief 50% slow effect upon arrival.
skills.description_html:
Zetian summons a Phoenix Spirit at the target location, dealing 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applying a brief 50% slow effect to enemies in the area. The Phoenix Spirit hovers at the location for 3s, dealing 20 (+10% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage every 0.5s and reducing enemies' Magic Defense by 10% while revealing their surrounding area.
While the Phoenix Spirit is active, Zetian can use this skill again to command it to charge toward a designated location, dealing 150 (+45% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applying a brief 50% slow effect upon arrival.

skills.name: Fury of the Phoenix
skills.description_text:
Zetian calls upon her divine mandate and the hearts of her people, granting all allied heroes 40% Movement Speed that gradually decays over 3s, while bringing divine retribution upon all enemy heroes, dealing 400 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.8s. Zetian gains vision of all enemy heroes during this time.
Zetian can cast other skills while channeling this skill.
skills.description_html:
Zetian calls upon her divine mandate and the hearts of her people, granting all allied heroes 40% Movement Speed that gradually decays over 3s, while bringing divine retribution upon all enemy heroes, dealing 400 (+100% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stunning them for 0.8s. Zetian gains vision of all enemy heroes during this time.
Zetian can cast other skills while channeling this skill.

quote: Recognized by the Heavens and cherished by her people, the Celestial Empress of the Cadia Riverlands ascends to bring peace to the mortal realm.

name: Kalea

skills.name: Surge of Life
skills.description_text:
After casting a skill, Kalea creates a Water Zone on the ground. When Kalea casts a skill within this zone, she will absorb the Water Zone to enhance her next three Basic Attacks with different effects:
First Basic Attack: Kalea dashes to the target, dealing (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Second Basic Attack: Kalea unleashes a flurry of attacks, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 120 (+10% Total HP) (+60% Total Magic Power) HP for herself and the nearby ally with the lowest HP.
Third Basic Attack: Kalea uses her tail to strike the area around her target, dealing 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and creating a new Water Zone. Enhanced Basic Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed.
skills.description_html:
After casting a skill, Kalea creates a Water Zone on the ground. When Kalea casts a skill within this zone, she will absorb the Water Zone to enhance her next three Basic Attacks with different effects:
First Basic Attack: Kalea dashes to the target, dealing (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Second Basic Attack: Kalea unleashes a flurry of attacks, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 120 (+10% Total HP) (+60% Total Magic Power) HP for herself and the nearby ally with the lowest HP.
Third Basic Attack: Kalea uses her tail to strike the area around her target, dealing 100 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and creating a new Water Zone. Enhanced Basic Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed.

skills.name: Wavebreaker
skills.description_text: Kalea slams her fist into the ground, creating a wave that deals 200 (+5% Total HP) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slows them by 40% for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Kalea slams her fist into the ground, creating a wave that deals 200<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slows them by 40% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Tidal Strike
skills.description_text:
Kalea charges forward and body slams the first enemy hero she encounters, knocking them airborne for 0.6s (unaffected by Resilience) while dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
If she collides with an obstacle or touches the edge of a Water Zone during her charge, Kalea will leap into the air. Cast the skill again to slam down at a target location, dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking enemies airborne for 0.6s (unaffected by Resilience).
skills.description_html:
Kalea charges forward and body slams the first enemy hero she encounters, knocking them airborne for 0.6s (unaffected by Resilience) while dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
If she collides with an obstacle or touches the edge of a Water Zone during her charge, Kalea will leap into the air. Cast the skill again to slam down at a target location, dealing 150 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and knocking enemies airborne for 0.6s (unaffected by Resilience).

skills.name: Tsunami Slam
skills.description_text: Kalea grabs an enemy hero with her tail and slams them down in the Joystick's direction (drag the Joystick to change landing spot). She gains Control Immunity during this process. Upon landing, deals 300 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target and nearby enemies.
skills.description_html: Kalea grabs an enemy hero with her tail and slams them down in the Joystick's direction (drag the Joystick to change landing spot). She gains Control Immunity during this process. Upon landing, deals 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target and nearby enemies.

quote: With her serpent tail, this proud descendant of the Great Serpent swims gracefully through the Vonetis Sea, aspiring to one day carry the full power of her heritage.

name: Lukas

skills.name: Hero's Resolve
skills.description_text:
Lukas gains 0.5 Resolve per second and an additional 2 Resolve when attacking heroes.

Lukas consumes 10 Resolve per second while in [Sacred Beast] form.
skills.description_html:
Lukas gains 0.5 Resolve per second and an additional 2 Resolve when attacking heroes.

Lukas consumes 10 Resolve per second while in [Sacred Beast] form.

skills.name: Flash Combo
skills.description_text:
Passive: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Combo up to 2 times, lasting 4s.
Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash Pulverize, dealing 220 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 8% of his Max HP when hitting a hero.
1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and spins his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, pulling the enemy toward him.
2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and follows up with 2 attacks that deal 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per hit. He will then spin his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, gaining Control Immunity during this period.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Combo up to 2 times, lasting 4s.
Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash Pulverize, dealing 220 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovering 8% of his Max HP when hitting a hero.
1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and spins his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, pulling the enemy toward him.
2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and follows up with 2 attacks that deal 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per hit. He will then spin his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+45% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, gaining Control Immunity during this period.

skills.name: Flash Step
skills.description_text:
Passive: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Combo up to 4 times, lasting 60 (+125% Total Physical Attack)s.
Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash a tail swing, dealing 40 (+25% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovers of his Max HP when hitting a hero.
1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and pounces to deal 20% Physical Damage 3 times, knocking the enemy back.
2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and leaps to deal 4 Physical Damage 2 times, then summons sacred lightning, dealing Physical Damage 3 times, and gaining Control Immunity during this period.
skills.description_html:
Passive: Basic Attacks enhance Flash Combo up to 4 times, lasting 60 (+125% Total Physical Attack)s.
Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash a tail swing, dealing 40 (+25% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovers of his Max HP when hitting a hero.
1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and pounces to deal 20% Physical Damage 3 times, knocking the enemy back.
2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and leaps to deal 4 Physical Damage 2 times, then summons sacred lightning, dealing Physical Damage 3 times, and gaining Control Immunity during this period.

skills.name: Unleash the Beast
skills.description_text:
Lukas transforms into his Sacred Beast form (briefly gaining Control Immunity). His base Movement Speed is increased by 30, all attributes are increased by 15%, and his skills gain new effects.
Use Again: Fires a Shockwave Blast in the target direction that will explode upon hitting an enemy hero or reaching its maximum range, dealing 450 (+155% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and causing 3 aftershocks that each deal 0 Physical Damage.
All attributes: HP, Physical Attack, Attack Speed, Physical & Magic Defense, and Attack Range.
skills.description_html:
Lukas transforms into his Sacred Beast form (briefly gaining Control Immunity). His base Movement Speed is increased by 30, all attributes are increased by 15%, and his skills gain new effects.
Use Again: Fires a Shockwave Blast in the target direction that will explode upon hitting an enemy hero or reaching its maximum range, dealing 450 (+155% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and causing 3 aftershocks that each deal 0 Physical Damage.
All attributes: HP, Physical Attack, Attack Speed, Physical & Magic Defense, and Attack Range.

quote: A legendary Sacred Beast that can take the form of a rambunctious young man.

name: Suyou

skills.name: Transient Immortal
skills.description_text:
Tap-casting any skill will put Suyou in his Mortal form, granting him 40 Movement Speed and decreasing the interval between Basic Attacks.
Hold-casting any skill will put Suyou in his Immortal form, increasing the damage of Basic Attacks to 125% and granting him 20% Physical Damage Reduction. In this form, for every 20 extra Physical Attack Suyou has, he gains 1% Physical Damage Reduction (up to 40%).
skills.description_html:
Tap-casting any skill will put Suyou in his Mortal form, granting him 40 Movement Speed and decreasing the interval between Basic Attacks.
Hold-casting any skill will put Suyou in his Immortal form, increasing the damage of Basic Attacks to 125% and granting him 20% Physical Damage Reduction. In this form, for every 20 extra Physical Attack Suyou has, he gains 1% Physical Damage Reduction (up to 40%).

skills.name: Blade Surge
skills.description_text:
Tap: Suyou throws his weapon in the target direction, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path. Suyou then blinks to the weapon's location, catches it, and performs a slash in the opposite direction, dealing 375 (+150% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Hold: Suyou channels the Immortal's power and charges in the target direction, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the path. When hitting an enemy hero, he stops and stuns enemies in a rectangular area in front for 0.6s. The charge distance increases with the hold time.
Suyou can be controlled while charging, but the skill cannot be interrupted.
skills.description_html:
Tap: Suyou throws his weapon in the target direction, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in its path. Suyou then blinks to the weapon's location, catches it, and performs a slash in the opposite direction, dealing 375 (+150% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
Hold: Suyou channels the Immortal's power and charges in the target direction, dealing 250 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the path. When hitting an enemy hero, he stops and stuns enemies in a rectangular area in front for 0.6s. The charge distance increases with the hold time.
Suyou can be controlled while charging, but the skill cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Soul Sever
skills.description_text:
Tap: Suyou performs a sweeping attack with his weapon, dealing Physical Damage equal to 300 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) plus 15% of target's Lost HP to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Hold: Suyou channels the power of the Immortal to perform 3 cleaves in a fan-shaped area. The first two strikes deal 250 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage each, while the final strike deals 400 (+128% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovers 150 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) HP for himself.
skills.description_html:
Tap: Suyou performs a sweeping attack with his weapon, dealing Physical Damage equal to 300 (+200% Extra Physical Attack) plus 15% of target's Lost HP to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Hold: Suyou channels the power of the Immortal to perform 3 cleaves in a fan-shaped area. The first two strikes deal 250 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage each, while the final strike deals 400 (+128% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and recovers 150 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) HP for himself.

skills.name: Evil Queller
skills.description_text:
Tap: Suyou glides backward and swings his weapon in the target direction, dealing 420 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and on his path backward, and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s.
Hold: Suyou uses the Immortal's power to shoot a deadly arrow in the target direction, dealing 580 (+165% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target hit. The range increases with the hold time.
Suyou can be controlled while charging, but the skill cannot be interrupted.
skills.description_html:
Tap: Suyou glides backward and swings his weapon in the target direction, dealing 420 (+120% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and on his path backward, and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s.
Hold: Suyou uses the Immortal's power to shoot a deadly arrow in the target direction, dealing 580 (+165% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to the target hit. The range increases with the hold time.
Suyou can be controlled while charging, but the skill cannot be interrupted.

quote: An exorcist from Zhu'an who has inherited the power of the Immortal Nuo.

name: Zhuxin

skills.name: Crimson Butterflies
skills.description_text:
Every time Zhuxin channels Lantern Flare, she converts the Mana spent into up to 15 Crimson Butterflies to follow her Spirit Lantern. After Zhuxin stops channeling Lantern Flare, the Crimson Butterflies will gradually disappear, each restoring 5% of her Max Mana.
Zhuxin has a naturally high base Max Mana, but it doesn't scale with her level.
skills.description_html:
Every time Zhuxin channels Lantern Flare, she converts the Mana spent into up to 15 Crimson Butterflies to follow her Spirit Lantern. After Zhuxin stops channeling Lantern Flare, the Crimson Butterflies will gradually disappear, each restoring 5% of her Max Mana.
Zhuxin has a naturally high base Max Mana, but it doesn't scale with her level.

skills.name: Fluttering Grace
skills.description_text: Zhuxin deals 150 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies in a fan-shaped area and applies 1 stack(s) of Soul Snare. Zhuxin also slows all enemy heroes hit by 20% and gains 20% of extra Movement Speed herself for 1.5s.
skills.description_html: Zhuxin deals 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to all enemies in a fan-shaped area and applies 1 stack(s) of <font color="a6aafb">Soul Snare</font>. Zhuxin also slows all enemy heroes hit by 20% and gains 20% of extra Movement Speed herself for 1.5s.

skills.name: Lantern Flare
skills.description_text:
Hold: Zhuxin can move the Spirit Lantern with the skill button, dealing 33 (+28% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies within range every 0.25s (damage to Minions increased by 28%) and applying Soul Snare to enemy heroes hit, each time consuming 120 Mana. When an enemy hero has 10 stacks of Soul Snare, the Crimson Butterflies will capture them, pulling them airborne for 1s.
Release: Throws all captured enemies to the target location, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies in the area. (If an enemy takes damage multiple times, subsequent damage taken will be reduced by 80%.)
skills.description_html:
Hold: Zhuxin can move the Spirit Lantern with the skill button, dealing 33 (+28% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies within range every 0.25s (damage to Minions increased by 28%) and applying Soul Snare to enemy heroes hit, each time consuming 120 Mana. When an enemy hero has 10 stacks of Soul Snare, the Crimson Butterflies will capture them, pulling them airborne for 1s.
Release: Throws all captured enemies to the target location, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to all enemies in the area. (If an enemy takes damage multiple times, subsequent damage taken will be reduced by 80%.)

skills.name: Crimson Beacon
skills.description_text: Zhuxin blinks to the target location while gaining a 400 (+100% Total Magic Power) shield. While flying, she creates a field around her for 6s. The field deals 60 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and applies 1 stack of Soul Snare to enemies every 1s.
skills.description_html: Zhuxin blinks to the target location while gaining a 400<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> shield. While flying, she creates a field around her for 6s. The field deals 60<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and applies 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Soul Snare</font> to enemies every 1s.

quote: A mysterious young woman who guides the ember butterflies using her Lantern of Spirits.

name: Chip

skills.name: Snack Time!
skills.description_text: Chip starts eating potato chips once every 2s when out of combat, regenerating HP equal to 300 plus 45% of lost HP after finishing a whole bag (requires 4 bites). After eating a bag of chips, Chip will be full and cannot eat again for 5s. (The bite count will be saved if he enters combat before finishing a whole bag.)
skills.description_html: Chip starts eating potato chips once every 2s when out of combat, regenerating HP equal to 300 plus 45% of lost HP after finishing a whole bag (requires 4 bites). After eating a bag of chips, Chip will be full and cannot eat again for 5s. (The bite count will be saved if he enters combat before finishing a whole bag.)

skills.name: Crash Course
skills.description_text: Chip rams his hovercraft into the ground, dealing Magic Damage equal to 100 plus 4% of target's Max HP and applying Chip's Mark on enemy heroes hit. Chip gains a 300 (+60% Total Magic Power) Shield upon hitting an enemy hero, which increases by 40% for each additional enemy hero hit. Chip's next Basic Attack will become ranged and also hit all nearby enemies with Chip's Mark, detonating the mark to deal 150 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and stun each target for 0.6s.
skills.description_html: Chip rams his hovercraft into the ground, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 100 plus 4% of target's Max HP and applying <font color="a6aafb">Chip's Mark</font> on enemy heroes hit. Chip gains a 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> Shield upon hitting an enemy hero, which increases by 40% for each additional enemy hero hit. Chip's next Basic Attack will become ranged and also hit all nearby enemies with <font color="a6aafb">Chip's Mark</font>, detonating the mark to deal 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and stun each target for 0.6s.

skills.name: Overtime
skills.description_text:
Chip rushes for 2s, gaining up to 65% extra Movement Speed, after which he maintains the max speed for 2s.

Chip's next Basic Attack will cause him to charge at the enemy, dealing 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and knocking them back slightly.
skills.description_html:
Chip rushes for 2s, gaining up to 65% extra Movement Speed, after which he maintains the max speed for 2s.

Chip's next Basic Attack will cause him to charge at the enemy, dealing 200 (+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and knocking them back slightly.

skills.name: Shortcut
skills.description_text:
Chip drops the Main Portal on an enemy hero, dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them by 25%. The Main Portal deals 2 times the damage and immobilizes them for 1s after a delay. Meanwhile, he creates Connecting Portals near allied heroes 10 units away and behind the allied Base. The Main Portal and Connecting Portals last up to 15s.
Connecting Portal: Heroes (on both teams) can teleport from Connecting Portals to the Main Portal, and allied heroes gain Burst Movement Speed for 1.5s and a 500 shield.
Main Portal: The Main Portal inherits 70% of Chip's attributes. Heroes can stand on the Main Portal for 2s to return to the Connecting Portal they came from. Casting skills or launching Basic Attacks will reset the stand time.
skills.description_html:
Chip drops the Main Portal on an enemy hero, dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage and briefly slowing them by 25%. The Main Portal deals 2 times the damage and immobilizes them for 1s after a delay. Meanwhile, he creates Connecting Portals near allied heroes 10 units away and behind the allied Base. The Main Portal and Connecting Portals last up to 15s.
Connecting Portal: Heroes (on both teams) can teleport from Connecting Portals to the Main Portal, and allied heroes gain Burst Movement Speed for 1.5s and a 500 shield.
Main Portal: The Main Portal inherits 70% of Chip's attributes. Heroes can stand on the Main Portal for 2s to return to the Connecting Portal they came from. Casting skills or launching Basic Attacks will reset the stand time.

skills.name: Why Walk?
skills.description_text: Chip has 4 fixed Beacons on the map when the battle starts. Use this skill to teleport to any other Beacon. (This skill cannot be used in combat.)
skills.description_html: Chip has 4 fixed <font color="a6aafb">Beacons</font> on the map when the battle starts. Use this skill to teleport to any other <font color="a6aafb">Beacon</font>. (This skill cannot be used in combat.)

quote: A carefree, genetically enhanced fox that wields advanced portal technology.

name: Cici

skills.name: Performer's Delight
skills.description_text: Cici generates a stack of Delight after dealing damage, increasing her Movement Speed by 0.75% and Spell Vamp by 0.75% per stack up to 10 times, doubling the effects at full stacks.
skills.description_html: Cici generates a stack of Delight after dealing damage, increasing her Movement Speed by 0.75% and Spell Vamp by 0.75% per stack up to 10 times, doubling the effects at full stacks.

skills.name: Yo-Yo Blitz
skills.description_text:
Cici uses Yoyo to continuously attack the nearest enemy within range (prioritizing heroes) for 3.5s, hitting them up to 10 times, and dealing Physical Damage equal to 70 plus 3 (+1.2% Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP per hit. Cici can move and use other skills during this attack.

If there is no enemy within range, Yoyo will attack Turrets or the Base instead.

This skill deals 20% extra damage to Minions.
skills.description_html:
Cici uses Yoyo to continuously attack the nearest enemy within range (prioritizing heroes) for 3.5s, hitting them up to 10 times, and dealing Physical Damage equal to 70 plus 3 (+1.2% Extra Physical Attack)% of the target's Max HP per hit. Cici can move and use other skills during this attack.

If there is no enemy within range, Yoyo will attack Turrets or the Base instead.

This skill deals 20% extra damage to Minions.

skills.name: Buoyant Bounce
skills.description_text: Cici leaps to a target location. If she lands on any unit (not including Turrets and Base), she can leap again in the Joystick's direction. If she lands on an enemy with the first leap, she deals 200 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to them.
skills.description_html: Cici leaps to a target location. If she lands on any unit (not including Turrets and Base), she can leap again in the Joystick's direction. If she lands on an enemy with the first leap, she deals 200<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to them.

skills.name: Curtain Call
skills.description_text:
Cici throws Yoyo at the target enemy hero and links them with another nearby enemy hero, dealing 100 (+10% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing them by 30%, and pulling them together for 4s.

During this time, Cici can use Yo-Yo Blitz to attack both linked targets at the same time. If only one target is within the range of Yo-Yo Blitz, Cici will attack the target twice, but the damage of the second attack will be reduced to 25%.
skills.description_html:
Cici throws Yoyo at the target enemy hero and links them with another nearby enemy hero, dealing 100 (+10% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, slowing them by 30%, and pulling them together for 4s.

During this time, Cici can use Yo-Yo Blitz to attack both linked targets at the same time. If only one target is within the range of Yo-Yo Blitz, Cici will attack the target twice, but the damage of the second attack will be reduced to 25%.

quote: A cheerful performer who spreads fun and wonderment wherever she goes.

name: Nolan

skills.name: Dimensional Rift
skills.description_text:
Nolan's skills will leave a Rift. When a rift comes into contact with another rift, they will activate and pull enemies to their center and deal 240 (+140% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage after a short delay. Each time a rift activation hits an enemy, Nolan will gain 20 Energy. If an enemy is hit by multiple rift activations, the damage after the first hit will be reduced by 40%.
Cosmic Leap: If Nolan does not deal or take damage for 5s, he enhances his next Basic Attack to dash to the target, dealing (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and leaving a Rift. (Damage to and from Minions or Creeps will not prevent Nolan from getting this effect.)
skills.description_html:
Nolan's skills will leave a Rift. When a rift comes into contact with another rift, they will activate and pull enemies to their center and deal 240 (+140% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage after a short delay. Each time a rift activation hits an enemy, Nolan will gain 20 Energy. If an enemy is hit by multiple rift activations, the damage after the first hit will be reduced by 40%.
Cosmic Leap: If Nolan does not deal or take damage for 5s, he enhances his next Basic Attack to dash to the target, dealing (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and leaving a Rift. (Damage to and from Minions or Creeps will not prevent Nolan from getting this effect.)

skills.name: Expansion
skills.description_text: Nolan cuts a rectangular area in front of him with his cosmic gauge, dealing 230 (+40% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and leaving a Rift at the first enemy hit.
skills.description_html: Nolan cuts a rectangular area in front of him with his cosmic gauge, dealing 230<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and leaving a <font color="a6aafb">Rift</font> at the first enemy hit.

skills.name: Gauge
skills.description_text: Nolan charges in the target direction and slashes with his cosmic gauge, dealing 70 (+13% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in his path and leaving a Rift.
skills.description_html: Nolan charges in the target direction and slashes with his cosmic gauge, dealing 70<font color="fba51f"> (+13% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in his path and leaving a <font color="a6aafb">Rift</font>.

skills.name: Fracture
skills.description_text: Nolan slashes at the target location 3 times, dealing 120 (+50% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage with each slash while leaving 3 rifts and slowing the target hit by 30% for 0.5s. The rifts will be activated automatically while Nolan dashes backward.
skills.description_html: Nolan slashes at the target location 3 times, dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> with each slash while leaving 3 rifts and slowing the target hit by 30% for 0.5s. The rifts will be activated automatically while Nolan dashes backward.

quote: A scholar that wanders the universe with split souls to save his daughter.

name: Ixia

skills.name: Siphon Starlium
skills.description_text:
Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of Starlium Charge to enemies on hit. When Ixia performs a Basic Attack on an enemy with two stacks of Starlium Charge, the attack will consume the stacks and be replaced with Siphon Starlium, dealing (+150% Total Physical Attack) (+200 Lifesteal) plus (+10*Hero Level) Physical Damage to the target. Ixia recovers HP equal to the damage dealt by Siphon Starlium (only 20(+150 Lifesteal)% against non-hero units).
Siphon Starlium can trigger on all enemies in front of Ixia that are within her Basic Attack range, but it cannot Crit.
Ixia's Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal.
skills.description_html:
Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of Starlium Charge to enemies on hit. When Ixia performs a Basic Attack on an enemy with two stacks of Starlium Charge, the attack will consume the stacks and be replaced with Siphon Starlium, dealing (+150% Total Physical Attack) (+200 Lifesteal) plus (+10*Hero Level) Physical Damage to the target. Ixia recovers HP equal to the damage dealt by Siphon Starlium (only 20(+150 Lifesteal)% against non-hero units).
Siphon Starlium can trigger on all enemies in front of Ixia that are within her Basic Attack range, but it cannot Crit.
Ixia's Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal.

skills.name: Dual Beam
skills.description_text:
Ixia fires 2 Starlium-charged energy beams along the ground in the target direction, dealing 75 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and slowing enemy heroes by 50%. Upon hitting an enemy hero, Ixia also gains 2 Movement Speed for s.

Enemies hit by both beams will take double damage.
skills.description_html:
Ixia fires 2 Starlium-charged energy beams along the ground in the target direction, dealing 75 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in a rectangular area and slowing enemy heroes by 50%. Upon hitting an enemy hero, Ixia also gains 2 Movement Speed for s.

Enemies hit by both beams will take double damage.

skills.name: Star Helix
skills.description_text: Ixia unleashes a canister of Starlium energy in the target direction, knocking back nearby enemies, and pulling enemies in range to the center line after a short delay and dealing 200 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage.
skills.description_html: Ixia unleashes a canister of Starlium energy in the target direction, knocking back nearby enemies, and pulling enemies in range to the center line after a short delay and dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

skills.name: Full Barrage
skills.description_text: Ixia reassembles her weapon into 6 smaller weapons and enters the Barrage state for 4s. In this state, Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills can hit enemies in the large fan-shaped area in front of her but not outside it. Ixia's Basic Attacks can hit up to 6 enemy units (prioritizes heroes), and Siphon Starlium will fire simultaneously with her normal Basic Attacks.
skills.description_html: Ixia reassembles her weapon into 6 smaller weapons and enters the <font color="a6aafb">Barrage</font> state for 4s. In this state, Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills can hit enemies in the large fan-shaped area in front of her but not outside it. Ixia's Basic Attacks can hit up to 6 enemy units (prioritizes heroes), and <font color="a6aafb">Siphon Starlium</font> will fire simultaneously with her normal Basic Attacks.

quote: The leader of Bad Soul and self-proclaimed inventor, she wields a homemade weapon powered by a stolen Starlium reactor.

name: Arlott

skills.name: Demon Gaze
skills.description_text:
Arlott possesses a demonic eye that will Mark enemy units near Arlott that become affected by control effects for 7s.
The eye will also automatically Mark a nearby enemy hero in vision every 7s.
skills.description_html:
Arlott possesses a demonic eye that will Mark enemy units near Arlott that become affected by control effects for 7s.
The eye will also automatically Mark a nearby enemy hero in vision every 7s.

skills.name: Dauntless Strike
skills.description_text: Arlott swings his lance forward, dealing 200 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and briefly stunning targets in an area. Targets hit by the farther part of the AOE will be stunned for 1s instead.
skills.description_html: Arlott swings his lance forward, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and briefly stunning targets in an area. Targets hit by the farther part of the AOE will be stunned for 1s instead.

skills.name: Vengeance
skills.description_text:
Arlott charges at an enemy, dealing 135 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (this skill cannot be interrupted during movement).
If Arlott's target is Marked, he gains a brief burst of Movement Speed, and this skill will deal double damage, immediately refresh its cooldown, and recover 70 (+60% Total Physical Attack) HP to Arlott (only restores 50% of that amount when used on a non-hero unit).
skills.description_html:
Arlott charges at an enemy, dealing 135 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (this skill cannot be interrupted during movement).
If Arlott's target is Marked, he gains a brief burst of Movement Speed, and this skill will deal double damage, immediately refresh its cooldown, and recover 70 (+60% Total Physical Attack) HP to Arlott (only restores 50% of that amount when used on a non-hero unit).

skills.name: Final Slash
skills.description_text:
Passive: Each level-up reduces Demon Gaze's interval by 1s.
Active: Arlott cleaves in front of him, dealing 400 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to targets in the area while pushing them to the end of the AOE and briefly revealing their location (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression).
skills.description_html:
Passive: Each level-up reduces Demon Gaze's interval by 1s.
Active: Arlott cleaves in front of him, dealing 400 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to targets in the area while pushing them to the end of the AOE and briefly revealing their location (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression).

quote: A demon human hybrid wielding two lances with a thirst for vengeance against both the Church and demons.
